languages.text: {n}Мехадендриты техножреца с интересом протягиваются в сторону Атилиуса, кажется, слегка его нервируя.{/n} "Сохранность и комплектация достойного уровня. Жаль, что внутри он пуст, из него мог бы выйти подобающий Вольному Торговцу глашатай-сервочереп. Неклассический".

traits.locale_text: {n}Механодендриты техножреца с интересом протягиваются в сторону Атилиуса, кажется, слегка его нервируя.{/n} "Сохранность и комплектация достойного уровня. Жаль, что внутри он пуст, из него мог бы выйти подобающий Вольному Торговцу глашатай-сервочереп. Неклассический".

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites reach toward Atilius with interest, seeming to unnerve him a little.{/n} "Adequately preserved. It is a pity that it is empty inside — it could have become a proper servo-skull herald for the Rogue Trader. Unorthodox."
languages.original_text: {n}Мехадендриты техножреца с интересом протягиваются в сторону Атилиуса, кажется, слегка его нервируя.{/n} "Сохранность и комплектация достойного уровня. Жаль, что внутри он пуст, из него мог бы выйти подобающий Вольному Торговцу глашатай-сервочереп. Неклассический".

traits.locale_text: {n}The tech-priest's mechadendrites reach toward Atilius with interest, seeming to unnerve him a little.{/n} "Safety and equipment on a decent level. It's a pity he is empty inside, he could have become a proper servo-skull herald for the Rogue Trader. Unorthodox."

{n}The tech-priest's mechadendrites reach toward Atilius with interest, seeming to unnerve him a little.{/n} "Safety and equipment on a decent level. It's a pity he is empty inside, he could have become a proper servo-skull herald for the Rogue Trader. Unorthodox."

{n}The Tech-Priest's mechadendrites reach toward Atilius with interest, seeming to unnerve him a little.{/n} "Safety and equipment on a decent level. It's a pity he is empty inside, he could have become a proper servo-skull herald for the Rogue Trader. Unorthodox."

{n}The Tech-Priest's mechadendrites reach toward Atilius with interest, seeming to unnerve him a little.{/n} "Safety and equipment on a decent level. It's a pity it is empty inside, it could have become a proper servo-skull herald for the Rogue Trader. Unorthodox."

{n}The Tech-Priest's mechadendrites reach toward Atilius with interest, seeming to unnerve him a little.{/n} "Safety and equipment on a decent level. It's a pity it is empty inside, it could have become a proper servo-skull herald for the Rogue Trader. Unorthodox."

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须饶有兴趣地伸向阿蒂利乌斯，让他感觉有些不安。{/n}“它的状态还不错，但可惜的是，它里面是空的，否则应该可以做成相当不错的伺服头骨供行商浪人使用，不太正统的那种。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites reach toward Atilius with interest, seeming to unnerve him a little.{/n} "Adequately preserved. It is a pity that it is empty inside — it could have become a proper servo-skull herald for the Rogue Trader. Unorthodox."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须饶有兴趣地伸向阿蒂利乌斯，让他感觉有些不安。{/n}“它的状态还不错，但可惜的是，它里面是空的，否则应该可以做成相当不错的伺服头骨供行商浪人使用，不太正统的那种。”

languages.text: {n}Las mecadendritas de Pasqal se extienden hacia Atilius con interés, lo que parece inquietarle ligeramente.{/n} «La conservación es adecuada. Es una lástima que esté vacío por dentro; podría haberse convertido en un servocráneo heraldo para {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Poco ortodoxo».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites reach toward Atilius with interest, seeming to unnerve him a little.{/n} "Adequately preserved. It is a pity that it is empty inside — it could have become a proper servo-skull herald for the Rogue Trader. Unorthodox."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las mecadendritas de Pasqal se extienden hacia Atilius con interés, lo que parece inquietarle ligeramente.{/n} «La conservación es adecuada. Es una lástima que esté vacío por dentro; podría haberse convertido en un servocráneo heraldo para {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Poco ortodoxo».

languages.text: {n}興味を抱いたパスカルの機械触手が伸ばされると、アティリウスは少しうろたえる様子を見せる。{/n}「保存状態は適切だ。中身が空っぽなのは残念だが、これが自由開拓者の来訪を告げるサーヴォスカルになったようだ。実に型破りだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites reach toward Atilius with interest, seeming to unnerve him a little.{/n} "Adequately preserved. It is a pity that it is empty inside — it could have become a proper servo-skull herald for the Rogue Trader. Unorthodox."

traits.locale_text: {n}興味を抱いたパスカルの機械触手が伸ばされると、アティリウスは少しうろたえる様子を見せる。{/n}「保存状態は適切だ。中身が空っぽなのは残念だが、これが自由開拓者の来訪を告げるサーヴォスカルになったようだ。実に型破りだ」

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Mechadendriten greifen interessiert nach Atilius, was ihn anscheinend etwas beunruhigt.{/n} "Angemessen erhalten. Leider ist er innen leer, sonst hätte er ein guter Servoschädel-Herold für {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} werden können. Unorthodox."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites reach toward Atilius with interest, seeming to unnerve him a little.{/n} "Adequately preserved. It is a pity that it is empty inside — it could have become a proper servo-skull herald for the Rogue Trader. Unorthodox."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Mechadendriten des Techpriesters greifen interessiert nach Atilius, was ihn anscheinend etwas beunruhigt.{/n} "Sicherheit und Ausrüstung sind auf einem anständigen Niveau. Leider ist er innen leer, sonst hätte er ein guter Servoschädel-Herold für {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} werden können. Unorthodox."

languages.text: {n}Les mécadendrites de Pasqal se tendent vers Atilius avec intérêt et semblent mettre le secrétaire mal à l'aise.{/n} « Parfaitement préservé. Dommage qu'il soit vide, il aurait pu faire un servocrâne de qualité pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Ce n'est pas une pratique habituelle. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites reach toward Atilius with interest, seeming to unnerve him a little.{/n} "Adequately preserved. It is a pity that it is empty inside — it could have become a proper servo-skull herald for the Rogue Trader. Unorthodox."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mécadendrites de Pasqal se tendent vers Atilius avec intérêt et semblent mettre le secrétaire mal à l'aise.{/n} « Parfaitement préservé. Dommage qu'il soit vide, il aurait pu faire un servocrâne de qualité pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Ce n'est pas une pratique habituelle. »

languages.text: {n}Atilius, Pasqal'ın mekadentritlerinin kendisine ilgiyle uzanmasından biraz tedirgin olmuş gibi.{/n} "Münasip şekilde muhafaza edilmiş. İçinin boş olması üzücü, Hür Tacir'e yakışır bir hizmelet haberci olabilirdi. Alışılmışın dışında."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites reach toward Atilius with interest, seeming to unnerve him a little.{/n} "Adequately preserved. It is a pity that it is empty inside — it could have become a proper servo-skull herald for the Rogue Trader. Unorthodox."

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius, Pasqal'ın mekadentritlerinin kendisine ilgiyle uzanmasından biraz tedirgin olmuş gibi.{/n} "Münasip şekilde muhafaza edilmiş. İçinin boş olması üzücü, Hür Tacir'e yakışır bir hizmelet haberci olabilirdi. Alışılmışın dışında."
